synonyms.synonym: Lysosomal H(+)-transporting ATPase V0 subunit a2
Vacuolar proton translocating ATPase 116 kDa subunit a isoform 2

protein.specific_function: Part of the proton channel of V-ATPases. Essential component of the endosomal pH-sensing machinery. May play a role in maintaining the Golgi functions, such as glycosylation maturation, by controlling the Golgi pH

go_class.description: monovalent inorganic cation transmembrane transporter activity
nucleobase, nucleoside, nucleotide and nucleic acid metabolic process
nucleobase, nucleoside and nucleotide metabolic process
proton-transporting two-sector atpase complex, proton-transporting domain
